verses.verse: Therefore, first of all, I strongly urge that humble requests, prayers, intercessions, and thanksgiving be made for all people.
For kings and all in authority, so that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in total godliness and honesty.
For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Savior,
who desires all people to be saved and come into the knowledge of the truth.
For there is one God and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
who gave himself as a ransom for all, [this was] the testimony in its proper time.
For this, I am appointed a preacher and apostle--I speak the truth in Christ; I do not lie--a teacher of the Gentiles for faith and knowledge of truth.
Therefore I want men to pray wherever they are, lifting up holy hands without anger and doubt.
In the same way also, that women dress themselves in modest clothes, inclined to avoid notice, and be in self-control, not with embroidered hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly clothes,
but with what is proper for women professing godliness along with good works.
Let women learn with quietness with all submissiveness.
Now I do not allow a woman to teach or usurp authority over a man but to be in quietness,
for Adam was formed first, then Eve.
Adam was not deceived, but the woman, being deceived, fell into transgression.
Nevertheless she will be saved through the childbearing, if they continue in faith, love, and holiness with self-control.
